title: FEATURE JOBS: Werx, Sweaty Betty PR, Australian School of Performing Arts + More
text:
Werx Pty Ltd are recruiting for a Producer/Project Manager (SYD) to be the go-between, reporting on all client activity but also acting as the front line for the agency. You will be working within the strategy team so good client relationship skills are required. You will have had at least 5 years experience within the account management role, have a good understanding of digital media and excellent communication skills. Find out more.

Sweaty Betty PR seek a talented Senior Publicist (SYD) with a minimum of 3 years’ experience working across lifestyle, wellbeing and beauty accounts to join the agency. The successful candidate will be switched-on and efficient with a solid understanding and appreciation for creative communications, teamwork & deadlines. You must thrive under pressure and have an organised approach to juggling multiple tasks at once. Apply now.

Australian School of Performing Arts are hiring for Music Tutors, Trainees & Venue Managers (Canberra). They have a number of opportunities available with varying levels of experience in performing arts and teaching, including singing teachers or individuals with a music education background, trainee singing teachers with no experience required and venue managers who ideally have experience in customer service and an avid interest in the performing arts. Find out more.

Want more great job opportunities? Here you go:

Designer Rugs are on the hunt for a Receptionist & Administrative Assistant (SYD) to join the team at head office, assisting all office and sales staff within the firm. Apply now.

The Monkeys seek an IT Support Officer (SYD) to provide helpdesk support to all staff and management while working in partnership with IT team members from their parent company, Accenture Interactive. Check it out.

Kayo Sports are recruiting for a Product/Operations Lead (SYD) who is an excellent communicator and influencer who can build relationships both internally and externally. Find out more.

Don’t let your dream job slip you by – Love your work! Find out more about our ethical jobs & non-for-profit jobs, jobs in WA and our jobs in Sydney, Perth, Melbourne, Brisbane, Adelaide, Gold Coast and more.

Follow us on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and get yourself signed up to our Daily Job Alerts.
